channel.title: Shops -.-"
channel.description: A ha. Ok , call me a noob but last night I randomly decided to attempt to build a server. I've been going well, placing NPCS is a piece of cake, adding commands, changing teleport co - ords and all that. But there's one thing that I haven't got the hang of and that's making shops x.x.. I swear i've tried everything ;|. Do you have to ugh find the NPC's name in Client.java and change the "wanneshop" number to a shop number in the shops.cfg file? If so i've tried that x_x. There is absolutely NO tuts on this, only a few dead links to some that are long gone now. If anyone could not laugh at me and help me, that'd be great. :D

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @xXH34DSH0TXx xXH34DSH0TXx
item.description:
@xXH34DSH0TXx wrote:

Sigh, still nothing v.v. Although you have pretty much told me how to do it , I just have to figure out what i’m doing wrong.

I used yet another NPC, replaced the NPCID thingy in client.java, got rid of that extra shop thing (there’s only a 43 now just to keep things simple) And still nothing. I talked to the npc, no reaction, I traded him and my client froze x_X…

Read full topic

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yeah, found your problem. You have 2 people doing the same shop. When you are making a new shop, in shops.cfg the shop you are making has to be 1 higher than the one above it. So if the one you had last originally was shop = 43, then your new one would be shop = 44. So change this stuff

shop = 44	Tester						1	1	1038	1	1040	1

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 2566) { //Tester PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 44; //Tester

Read full topic

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @xXH34DSH0TXx xXH34DSH0TXx
item.description:
@xXH34DSH0TXx wrote:

Yeah. Worst thing is, there is not a single tut on these forums about what seemed like one of the most simple steps to making a server. It’s been bugging me alot, felt like a noob getting frustrated over not working out how to use shops when you have those nubs who host bare varrock based servers with shops >.<.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @xXH34DSH0TXx xXH34DSH0TXx
item.description:
@xXH34DSH0TXx wrote:

This is the shop that i’m trying to add. (shops.cfg)

shop = 43	Tester						1	1	1038	1	1040	1

(guess that’s hard to tell if anything is wrong with it but anyways x.x.)

This is from the autospawn.cfg

spawn = 2566	2871	2951	0	0	0	0	0	1	Joe shop

And last but not least, this is from client.java

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 2566) { //Tester PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 43; //Tester

I’m thinking I have done something wrong with that ^. Changed one line too many or something. Any ideas x.x?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @xXH34DSH0TXx xXH34DSH0TXx
item.description:
@xXH34DSH0TXx wrote:

Tried about 4 Npcs now, no luck. I think i’ve just gone wrong somewhere in the first steps lmao. Would posting my bits of code where I was meant to chuck stuff in on here help? So that you could look at it and see anything wrong with it x.x?

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Yeah, you used an NPC that wasn’t built into your server’s cache. I warn you not to use the Wise Old Man… If you do, then use the 2566 one.

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Hmm… there should be nothing wrong with my tut seeing as other people, including myself, have used it and got no problems. Make sure you are not using the Trade option on the NPC, just Talk to them to open the shop. If you are just Talking to them, just try choosing another NPC.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @xXH34DSH0TXx xXH34DSH0TXx
item.description:
@xXH34DSH0TXx wrote:

Ooooh. I haven’t tried yet but i’ll give it a go now, tyvm appreciated.

EDIT

Uhh.
Alright I did everything you said although you weren’t very clear with the client.java bit. The thing you told me to post under the rune shop, was I meant to replace the similar text there with your code? If so that is what I did. It had uhh NPCID == NPCOFID. You said not to touch NPCID , Am I meant to change NPCOFID to the npc Id that I chose and put in the autospawn.cfg? I left it as it was the first time, compiled with an error specifically regarding the “N” in NPCID. So I changed NPCID with the npc I used, and it compiled fine, but every time I went to get onto the server I just got error T2 even though I had no errors compiling x.x. My nubness is aggrivating innit.

Read full topic

item.title: Shops -.-"
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Here’s my little tutorial on making shops…

Ok, open up shops.cfg. Add this

shop = ##	NAMEOFSHOP					2	2	ITEMID	AMOUNT	ITEMID	AMOUNT

Replace the required things. Now open up autospawn.cfg. Add this underneath your Aubury spawn

spawn = NPCID	XCOORD	YCOORD	0	0	0	0	0	1	Joe shop

Replace the required things. Now open up client.java and under

WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

add this

} else if (NPCID == NPCOFID) { //SHOPNAME PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = ##; //SHOPNAME
Replace the required things, but ~DO NOT TOUCH “NPCID”~. Now save, compile and run.

Read full topic
